---
title: "Results from Joel's Class"
output:
  pdf_document:
    fig_height: 6
    fig_width: 8
date: March 20, 2014
---

```{r echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
sd<-read.csv("bakerclass_pilot.csv")

levels(sd[,2])<-c("16-21","22-29","30-39","40-49","50-59")
levels(sd[,3])<-c("tac","pierce","balance","far")
sd<-sd[,c(4:18)]
for(i in 1:ncol(sd)){
  sd[,i]<-as.numeric(sd[,i])
}
for(i in 1:ncol(sd)){
	sd[,i]<-as.character(sd[,i])
}
levels(sd[,1])<-c("1","1-3","4-10",">10")
levels(sd[,2])<-c(2,1,0,-1,-2)
levels(sd[,3])<-c(2,1,0,-1,-2)
levels(sd[,4])<-c(2,1,0,-1,-2)
levels(sd[,5])<-c(1,.75,.5,.25,0)
levels(sd[,6])<-c(1,.75,.5,.25,0)
levels(sd[,7])<-c(5,2,1,.25,0)
levels(sd[,8])<-c(5,2,1,.25,0)
levels(sd[,9])<-c(0,1,2,3,4)
levels(sd[,10])<-c(4,3,2,1)
levels(sd[,11])<-c(0,1,3,12,52)
levels(sd[,12])<-c(0,1,3,12,52)
levels(sd[,13])<-c(0,1,3,12,52)
levels(sd[,14])<-c(1,.66,.5,.33,0)
levels(sd[,15])<-c(1,.66,.5,.33,0)

out<-sd
out$id<-1:nrow(out)
require(reshape2)
mout<-melt(out, id="id")
require(ggplot2)
```

```{r Response Histograms, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(mout)+geom_histogram(aes(x=value))+facet_wrap(~variable)+ggtitle("Responses to Individual Questions, Joel's Class")
```

```{r Responses Stacked, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(mout)+geom_bar(aes(x=variable,fill=value), position="stack",stat="bin")+theme_bw()+ggtitle("Question Responses Binned, Joel's Class")+xlab("Question")+ylab("Response")
```

```{r Response Patterns, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(mout)+geom_line(aes(x=variable, y=value, group=id))+facet_wrap(~id)+ggtitle("Individual Response Patterns")+ylab("Question")+xlab("value")
```
